context: Good morning! I'm in the mood to see a movie. Any suggestions?
I do like comedy movies as well as others. We really enjoyed Daddy's Home (2015) .
Of course, you have to see The Dark Knight (2008)
Yes, that is a good movie. We really love Will Ferrill here.
In comedy, Juno (2007) is a very good movie, with a profond message
Juno (2007) is good. I like silly comedies like Airplane! (1980) , also.
resp: And Daddy's Home 2 (2017) is very good too! Those oldies comedy movies are great! I hope you have a very nice day my friend
